question: Which Bollywood personality has been bestowed with Smita Patil Memorial Award 2018?
explanation: Anushka  Sharma has been bestowed with the prestigious Smita Patil Memorial Award 2018  at the 34th edition of Priyadarshni Academyâ€™s Global Awards  in Mumbai, Maharashtra on September 19. The Priyadarshni Academy is a non-profit, socio-cultural and educational organization.
